resources.string:
Something has gone wrong.

Possible reasons:
- Instagram blocked you temporarily (this can happen if you made too many requests to Instagram). As a result none or only a few posts can be updated or displayed and profiles cannot be shown
- you tried to access a post or an account which is not available anymore
- you tried to access a restricted profile
- the application has lost the internet connection

Please try again later or change the network (e.g. switch to mobile data or wifi).
Looks like you\'ve been searching too much on Instagram and now Instagram won\'t answer.\nPlease try again later.
Updating the accounts failed.\nPlease try again later.
Updating the bookmarked posts failed.\nPlease try again later.
This post might not be available anymore. Do you want to go back?
Not all accounts could be queried.

Not all accounts could be queried.

Possible reasons:
- Instagram blocked you temporarily (this can happen if you made too many requests to Instagram). As a result none or only a few posts can be updated or displayed and profiles cannot be shown
- you tried to access a post or an account which is not available anymore
- you tried to access a restricted profile
- the application has lost the internet connection

Please try again later or change the network (e.g. switch to mobile data or wifi).

No account could be queried.

Possible reasons:
- Instagram blocked you temporarily (this can happen if you made too many requests to Instagram). As a result none or only a few posts can be updated or displayed and profiles cannot be shown
- you tried to access a post or an account which is not available anymore
- you tried to access a restricted profile
- the application has lost the internet connection

Please try again later or change the network (e.g. switch to mobile data or wifi).
There are no results for your search.
There are no saved posts.\nSave posts to view them here.

Thanks for using %1$s.

This app is designed for people who want to follow their favorite accounts without being registered with Instagram.

Please note that private profiles cannot be displayed. Instagram prohibits this.

I am not affiliated with Instagram.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please write in the Play Store.

If you like the app, please leave a 5-star rating in the Play Store.
Oops, looks like you\'re not following accounts yet. Click on the search icon to follow accounts and see their posts here.
Looks like this account is private.\nPosts can therefore not be displayed.
Are you sure you want to close this application?
The thumbnails of the bookmarks and the bookmarks itself will be refreshed. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
The thumbnails of the accounts and the accounts itself will be refreshed. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
Set the number of columns of posts of the feed
If system is in dark mode, this has no effect
Set the number of columns of posts when viewing an account
Adds an advertising text to the copied text to help spread Feedsta
Enables video controls such as play, pause, fast forward or back
Do you really want to remove the selected bookmarks? The bookmarks will be deleted. This operation cannot be undone.
Do you really want to remove the failed posts from your bookmarks? This operation cannot be undone.
This might take a while. Please wait until download is finished.

bookmarks could not be refreshed.

Possible causes:
- the account or post was deleted
- too many requests were made to Instagram
- Internet access was temporarily interrupted

If the number is high, it is very likely that the problem is only temporary. You should try again later.

You can either override the existing bookmarks and remove the failed bookmarks or try again later.
Please note: removed or overridden bookmarks cannot be restored!

accounts could not be refreshed.

Possible causes:
- the account was deleted or renamed
- too many requests were made to Instagram
- Internet access was temporarily interrupted

If the number is high, it is very likely that the problem is only temporary. You should try again later.

You can either override the existing accounts and remove the failed accounts from your followed accounts or try again later.
Please note: removed or overridden accounts cannot be restored!
Do you really want to remove the selected accounts from your followed accounts? This operation cannot be undone.
Do you really want to remove the selected account from your followed accounts? This operation cannot be undone.
Please restart the app to see the changes.
\n\nThis link was shared with Feedsta - Viewer for Instagram https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.amnesica.feedsta
\n\nThis link was shared with Feedsta - Viewer for Instagram https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.amnesica.feedsta
\n\nThis link was shared with Feedsta - Viewer for Instagram https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.amnesica.feedsta
This collection does not contain any posts
A collection with the name already exists.\nPlease choose another name
If the folder contains previous exported files these are overwritten.
Existing data in app will be overwritten with imported files.
The phone must be restarted for the changes to take effect.

Do you really want to remove all bookmarks of the selected collection? The bookmarks will be deleted. This operation cannot be undone.\n\nIf you only want to delete the collection but keep the bookmarks use \"Remove only collection\"!
Start moving to other collection. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
All bookmarks in the collection will be deleted. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
Start renaming collection in bookmarks. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
Start removing selected bookmarks. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
Start removing only selected collections from bookmarks. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
Start removing selected bookmarks from this collection. This might take several minutes! Please do not close the window or shut down the app.
Choose directory to export data to
Choose directory to import data from
Some data may not be imported.\n Please restart your phone
Only one collection can be renamed at a time
This operation cannot be applied to collection \"All\". Operation cancelled
At least one collection needs to be selected
This operation can only be applied to bookmarks with a collection. Operation cancelled
Download of least one post failed, try again later

Thanks for installing Feedsta!

This app allows you to follow your favorite public profiles on Instagram and view their posts without having Instagram and being registered there. Please understand that private profiles and stories in general cannot be seen!

If you're using the app Instagram might block you temporarily. This can happen if you make too many requests to Instagram. As a result none or only a few posts can be updated or displayed and profiles cannot be shown. In this case you might want to wait a while and try again later or change the network (e.g. switch to mobile data or Wifi). Unfortunately, there is nothing I can do about it.

I hope you still like this app. If you want you can leave a 5-star rating in the Play Store.

Have fun!
Seems like there are no posts yet. Refresh to fetch posts from your followed accounts.
